main.java.com.djrapitops.plan.data.cache

Class DataCacheHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.com.djrapitops.plan.data.cache.SessionCache
      • main.java.com.djrapitops.plan.data.cache.LocationCache
        • main.java.com.djrapitops.plan.data.cache.DataCacheHandler

  • public class DataCacheHandler
extends LocationCache
    This Class contains the Cache. This class is the main processing class that initializes Save, Clear, Process and Get queue and Starts the asyncronous save task. It is used to store commanduse, locations, active sessions and UserData objects in memory. It's methods can be used to access all the data it stores and to clear them.
    Since:
    2.0.0
    Author:
    Rsl1122

                                throws IllegalArgumentException,
                                       IllegalStateException
        Used to start the Asyncronous Save Task.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - BukkitRunnable was given wrong parameters.
        IllegalStateException - BukkitScheduler is in a wrong state.

      • getUserDataForProcessing

        public void getUserDataForProcessing(DBCallableProcessor processor,
                                     UUID uuid,
                                     boolean cache)
        Uses Database or Cache to retrieve the UserData of a matching player. Caches the data to the Cache if cache-parameter is true.
        Parameters:
        processor - DBCallableProcessor Object used to process the data after it was retrieved
        uuid - Player's UUID
        cache - Whether or not the UserData will be Cached in this instance of DataCacheHandler after it has been fetched (if not already fetched)

      • cache

        public void cache(UserData data)
        Used to Cache a UserData object to the Cache. If a object already exists it will be replaced.
        Parameters:
        data - UserData object with the UUID inside used as key.

      • getUserDataForProcessing

        public void getUserDataForProcessing(DBCallableProcessor processor,
                                     UUID uuid)
        Uses Database or Cache to retrieve the UserData of a matching player. Always Caches the data after retrieval (unless already cached)
        Parameters:
        processor - DBCallableProcessor Object used to process the data after it was retrieved
        uuid - Player's UUID

      • saveCachedUserData

        public void saveCachedUserData()
        Saves all UserData in the cache to Database. ATTENTION: TODO - Doesn't save the Locations in the locationCache. Should only be called from Async thread

      • addToPool

        public void addToPool(HandlingInfo i)
        Used to add event HandlingInfo to the processTask's pool. Given HandlingInfo object's process method will be called.
        Parameters:
        i - Object that extends HandlingInfo.

      • saveCacheOnDisable

        public void saveCacheOnDisable()
        Saves all data in the cache to Database and closes the database down. Stops all tasks. If processTask has unprocessed information, it will be processed.

      • saveCachedData

        public void saveCachedData(UUID uuid)
        Saves the cached data of matching Player if it is in the cache.
        Parameters:
        uuid - Player's UUID

      • saveCommandUse

        public void saveCommandUse()
        Saves the cached CommandUse. Should be only called from an Asyncronous Thread.

      • saveHandlerDataToCache

        public void saveHandlerDataToCache()
        Refreshes the calculations for all online players with ReloadInfo.

      • clearCache

        public void clearCache()
        Schedules all UserData from the Cache to be cleared.

      • getCommandUse

        Used to get the cached commandUse.
        Returns:

      • handleReload

        public void handleReload()
        If /reload is run this treats every online player as a new login. Calls all the methods that are ran when PlayerJoinEvent is fired

        Used by Analysis for Player activity graphs.
